website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat the convenient design, overall comfort, and long-term reliability for the price of this inexpensive folding exercise bike.
pros: Large and easy to read LCD screen
Simple to fold down for storage
cons: Even at its highest setting, its seat may be too short for taller riders

customer_reviews.title: Fit's me and I'm (almost) 5'! :)
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! I think the digital monitor is a little off (I think it says you're doing better than you actually are as far as calories, distances, and speed goes), but overall, it's literally my favorite buy ever! It's super-quiet (can't even hear yourself ride it), and it's perfect to keep you motivated. No more excuses as to why you can't cycle! Also! I'm 5' (on a good day), and this fits me perfectly on the shortest setting. Thinking even if I was an inch or two shorter, I'd still be able to work it. That was my biggest concern when purchasing it :)
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Study, effective and cost efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for quick and easy in-home workouts while watching TV in the evenings. I read the reviews extensively before I purchased. The bike came very quickly (free shipping, came in 4-5 days max) and was easily moved in the house. I was able to put the whole thing together, by myself, in 10 minutes. The directions are very clearly written and easy to follow. It's also pretty common-sensical. It's compact, fits nicely in my small space and does fold up. The bike is pretty sturdy and you can definitely work up a sweat. Great quality and great price. Perfect for moderately interested fitness or health folks looking for a low-investment piece for their home.
customer_reviews.author: Christine P.

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value!  Would buy again 10 out of 9 times!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! It is silent and the settings are perfect. It was so easy to put together and I cannot believe the value for the price. I feel like I stole it! If you are thinking about getting this don't worry and don't hesitate. I like to work out early in the morning and I don't wake anyone in the family up on this bike! I can even have the TV on low and still hear it. The seat is comfortable. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Bike is Unuseable after only 4 months. Amazon could care less!
customer_reviews.text: I was riding the bike every single day for four months. I was really enjoying it. On April 25, I was enjoying my bike ride when SNAP the right pedal SNAPPED right off of the bike! I am so sad, I was feeling so good about doing something good for my mind and body. Of course, the deadline for product help was APRIL 23 and the bike broke on April 25. I am hoping that someone sees this and contacts me. I am not a rich person and I cannot afford to buy a new bike. I tried using duct tape...that was USELESS. The bike DIED .HELP?
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: cancer warning
customer_reviews.text: cancer warning in instruction manual should be in product info so you can avoid purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen

customer_reviews.title: I love this little exercise bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this little exercise bike. After a serious fall outdoors on my walk, I was nervous about walking too far away from my house (I am 78 years old) so I opted to gamble on this. Could not be happier. The computer appears to be more or less accurate---says I burn around 200 calories in about 25 minutes so I am going to start doing it twice a day. I set it up in my office where I can watch news or whatever and pedal away. Easy to assemble, quite moveable even for a "little old lady"....What a bargain! Buy this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Lila Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, but a really awkward position with the peddles too far forward
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very quiet, good tracking and stats on the little monitor. My only complaint is that the peddles are super far forward and it makes for a really unnatural-feeling stance. I feel like I'm just sitting on my butt and not engaging my core in any way, so it feels like half a workout. I'm basically thinking that I will use this bike as a stepping stone to something better: get myself in the habit of cycling before spending money on something higher quality and more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Annastina

customer_reviews.title: Great exercycle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! I wanted something sturdy, lightweight, quiet, and relatively small, and this fits the bill perfectly! It's extremely quiet so my using it doesn't bother other folks in the house. I can fold it up and easily move it to another part of the room when I'm finished using it. The readout gives me lots of information (more than I expected or needed). And the whole thing feels very sturdy while I'm biking - no wobbliness at all. Very happy I purchased this bike!
customer_reviews.author: MingoFan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This item does not fit you comfortably if your short. It also doesn’t produce enough resistance to work a sweat. I wish I never bought it. I used it once and now amazon won’t return it. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Penna

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Great standstill bike, you can move it around put it in the living room or bedroom; however, I needed a little help in assembling it! Now I use it all the time. Really helps to loose weight around the tummy area and tone kegs. Very useful and helpful, great price for the buck too!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: ... bar but once I am on it I am comfortable and it's very quiet as I am pedaling I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very short 4 foot 9 I have a little bit of trouble getting my leg over the middle bar but once I am on it I am comfortable and it's very quiet as I am pedaling I am also a heart patient and I find the bike very easy to use the only other problem I have with this there's no on/off button for the control panel so it keeps running until the batteries run out I give it 4 stars because, 1 I do like the way it operates, 2 I can fold it away for storage and, 3 it is easy to maneuver into position when I do need it
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I received this from the returns department of Amazon and I had a feeling that was odd. When I opened the box, everything looked okay and packaged well. But as I was building the bike I realized that the main frame had this lip issue at the bottom when I opened it. I checked and it was still pretty sturdy. You definitely get what you pay for. The bike does the trick but I am not thrilled they gave me a bike someone else returned.
customer_reviews.author: rivercitynat

customer_reviews.title: Great workout, great product.
customer_reviews.text: As a fitness junkie who works from home and can’t get to the gym all the time, this is the perfect addition to my home workout. Easy to assemble, easy to use, and perfect for a short person of 5’3 stature. I pedal hard and fast, and this bike can withstand a tough cardio workout. Perfect for my small apartment too! Great for my current needs, space allowance, and budget. Cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: LCD screen does not work :(
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen does not work. It does not measure any function it is supposed to measure. I bought it over a month ago, but i didn’t assemble it until last week. Now that the return period is over, and I had defective product.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had this bike for a few days and one of the petals broke. We called support and they mailed us out a pedal. We could not screw it in because the metal was stripped. We called support again and they sent us a crank arm. Once we received that we realized it requires special tools. When we called support again they said that the crankcase arm on the bikes gets screw on very tight in the factory with power torque wrench and acknowledged it would be very difficult to remove by hand. I don’t know if the average person owns one of these... but we do not. So bottom line we are returning this bike and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SLP Book Nook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled...
customer_reviews.text: The bike showed up quickly & took less than 10min to assemble. The reaistance is nice and the unit is basically silent.That said, your height matters. I’m 5’8 and at the highest seat setting my knees were basically at a 90° angle on the upswing which basically means your extension going down isn’t full & puts unnecessary stress on your joints. I had to drill another hole closer to the end of the shaft to compensate. I’d say that if you’re over 5’5 or simply don’t have short legs...you may want to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: KingOfThe9

customer_reviews.title: Rated features, Fair to Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Folding Exercise Bike construction quality - very good ease of assembly - excellent quiet operation - excellent seat height selection - very good (if under 6 feet tall) comfort of seat - fair resistance settings - very good (30 minute workout) sturdy (when peddling) - very good folding feature - very good Didn't install the console For my comfort I reversed the handlebar
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: Display quit after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointing. Used it last night and it was great! Went to use it today and nothing is registering on the display. My pulse will, but not time, calories, distance, or anything else. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm33

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: The set up was fairly quick, although the cords to plug in to the face plate that connected the heart rate monitor and told the tension controls what to do had to be rigged. We had to drill another hole out of the plastic back plate to get the cords to connect. After roughly 2 months of sparring use the tension controls no longer work. The bike can only be used on low tensions (1-3) after that it starts grinding and/or not able to pedal at all once it passes 5 on the tension control. I wish I could return it but haven’t had any luck getting in touch with the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amandalie Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this bike since we bought and at first it was super quiet, and then it starting making a thumping noise. Could not figure out the noise and then it got louder and louder and the right peddle was loose. Tonight while riding my husband was peddling and the right peddle flew off the bike We discovered that the metal is completely stripped inside. So the bike is unusable now. I am very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely satisfied with this bike
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this bike. To those who buy this bike I recommend paying close attention when assembling because one of the wires to the monitor is tied around the handel bares and will be pinched or cut when the bars are bolted in place. This will obviously cause a problem with the monitor so be sure and untie it before assembling. I read the one and only negative review and can only assume that this person had the problem with their monitor because of this reason because I almost missed seeing the wire myself during the assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Finch

customer_reviews.title: LIMITED SEAT ADJUSTMENT IS A DEAL BREAKER
customer_reviews.text: If you are over 5' 5", you can not adjust the seat higher to accommodate proper leg positioning. See picture. What you can't see is that there are 3 more holes. If you attempt to raise it to 5 holes, the seat knob can't find a hole to tighten the seat post. I contacted the company to see what could be done to correct positioning. I was even willing to buy a longer seat post. To no avail-I believe it is because it is built in China and only distributed out of Arkansas. I must say that on every other aspect IT IS A GREAT BIKE FOR THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: DIVER226

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for cancerious material
customer_reviews.text: So mad that description mentions nothing about Birth defects and cancer causing material!!!! I was putting it together as a gift for my mother when I read disclaimer label regarding cancer causing material!!!!! If this company was honest it would and should add that to description! Now I have to repack it and return it!!!! What a waste of time and didn't have gift for mom!!!!!! UGH
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Escape Corona While Pedaling in Place
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my apartment gym closed for the Corona Plague ‘20. It is now my one reliable source of happiness. Super quiet (sometimes squeaks in high tensions as do most stationary bikes), and really can make you work up a sweat. Put it in front of the window, on your balcony, or in front of the TV to pretend you’re anywhere but self isolating inside. Super easy to assemble. I (29 y/o former communications major) was able to put it together in about 35 minutes without additional tools. You got this.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bike for four months and used it very little at first, but have been using it for about 1.5 hour daily at a low speed over the last week. An essential piece - the tab that the adjustment pin goes into - has warped, making it unstable. It has warped outwards, so it doesn't seem to be related to over-use. Check the pin tabs when you get yours. My return window has closed, so I hope it can be fixed by hammering it back into place, but just know that that;s a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Not for normal height people.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little bike. It appears to be very well made and was very easy to assemble. However, this bike was definitely made for short people. I am only 5'11" and the seat does not extend far enough for me to ride comfortably. Not enough leg extension. Since we purchased it to have something for cardio exercise during the coronavirus event, it will suffice. We will make it work and get our exercise, but it is not something I would want to use over a long time. I would venture to say if you are 5'7" or less, it should be a very nice little addition.
customer_reviews.author: Read B. Mecleary

customer_reviews.title: RIP TO YOUR BUTT AND SOFT PARTS
customer_reviews.text: COMPUTER ON BIKE DOES NOT WORK. Does not fold up very easily. The bike seat genuinely puts so much pain on my inner butt crack and balls that I have to use a pillow just to ride this thing. I actually don’t even use it because my butt and sensitive parts hurt for hours after using it for even 30min. Wish I dished out 50 more bucks to get something not so incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike but not for tall people!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" and weight 225lbs (with big thighs) so unfortunately I had to return this bike and choose a different model. This is a nice bike for shorter people, silent, easy to setup and perfect for small spaces since it can be folded but if you're over 5'10" you won't feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Renato

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought to assist rehab after knee surgery - wasn't looking for anything fancy. Read reviews so knew of shortcomings. Product as expected & what I was looking for. This is a simple, almost no frills stationary bike (it does have a simple computer which shows time elapsed, speed, distance, odometer, calories, & pulse). This may not serve if you're looking for a cycling training machine & I'm not sure how durable it will be having had it only a week. Pros: Inexpensive Quick, easy assembly Small footprint, even smaller when stored Easy to move Attributes adequate for needs Cons: Too short seat post, even tho I'm only 5'9" Awkward mount resulting from X-frame construction
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight bike
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight this bike is making it to convenient to pull out for use then putting it away when done. The seat is easy to adjust to your height and there is a monitor that cycles through the stats of the workout, including heart-rate if you use the sensors on the handle. It is quiet while in use and steady. The only complaint I have is actually about the monitor, as there is no way to turn it off manually. It shuts off automatically, but not until after 4 or 5 mins of the bike being idle. That seems like an unnecessary drain on the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: japlaza

customer_reviews.title: Compact Exercise Bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact smooth pedaling stationary bike. It took about 25 minutes to unpack and put together, it was an easy assembly with my tools. Xterra has great customer service, the console on the bike was not working properly so I gave them a call. Not only did they replace the console but the customer service rep registered the bike for me so it was covered under warranty. Overall I am pleased with the bike.
customer_reviews.author: ken7

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I am actually really surprised by this exercise bike. I don't really have anything to compare it to, however, being that this is my first exercise bike purchase, I gotta say I am pleased with the value and the overall performance. Its small but sturdy. I love that its compact and fits in my room. It's quiet - I don't have to turn up the TV when I'm pedaling. Perfect for getting some extra calories burned and building and maintaining endurance during a shelter in place. I don't know about the accuracy of the display, but I definitely feel the burn, and that's what matters. My clothes will be the tell tale from the effort I put into the exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Tina C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great service
customer_reviews.text: 6/18/2020 I had an issue with the center console it stop working just called this morning and talked with Shane in the parts department and He took right care of the issue and sent a new one Thank You Shane for quick service today ! Neil
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, if I could give 10 stars I would! I wanted something lightweight and compact enough to fit in a corner of the bedroom for quick and convenient workouts. This is it!! I work retail and my schedule is erratic so it’s sometimes hard to get to the gym, I initially got this to fill in when I can’t get to the gym. Let me tell you, I’ve barely been there since getting this! I use it at least 5 days a week, and in this Coronavirus time that everything is shut down it’s a lifesaver! Buy. This. Bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Callow

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and affordable cardio machine
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bike for my short/small frame. I’m 5 feet tall and have a 26” inseam. This is a bike myself and my whole family (all members under 6’ tall) can use. Super easy to assemble. Our whole family has been LOVING this bike for cardio during quarantine. Doing it on level 4 and above will definitely make you break a sweat. The seat took a little adjusting to but once you get used to it (by the third ride) it’s comfortable and enjoyable. Highly recommend this bike but do keep an eye on the price as it fluctuates frequently between $120-$150.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stationary bike!!! Best thing I have bought so far. I’m 5’7” and my legs fit perfect and the seat is so comfortable. I just had knee surgery a week ago and the doctor recommended that I start riding to strengthen my muscle, so I just started and love everything about it!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BIKE!!! Talking my sister into buying the same one!!😊
customer_reviews.author: Marie C DiMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bike
customer_reviews.text: Super small, convenient bike for what I need. I do 30-60min while watching tv and it’s perfect for what I need. Super easy to assemble, the bike is quiet and smooth. Only problem I noticed is I reaaaalllyyy don’t think the calorie counter is that accurate but it’s fun to think I burned that many calories in under an hour lol would recommend for anyone looking to shed a few pounds without having to hit the gym or take your workout outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not a serious exercise bike
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to assembly and maneuver. However this is a toy, not a for serious workouts. It is too short for me (5'11"). For biking, you should be able to stretch your leg to a relaxed straight (basically straight, not absolutely straight) but for me, this bike is too small. While this is not the real problem, the big problem is, the resistance is weak, you can't work for sweat with it. So, OK for kids and a bit activity other than sitting at the desk for a whole day, not for serious workout.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: Best $150 ever spent, period. Here's my story. I live in a big city, with plenty of gym options. The problem, too crowded after work, no parking, broken equipment, long waits, costly memberships, too stressful! After deliberating, decided to take a chance. Changed my life. So compact, fits easily in 2 br, 1200 sq.ft condo, extremely quiet, great resistance, comfortable seat, well made all around. We use it almost daily, in our quiet home, watching tv, it has truly improved our health and quality of life, for a mere $150.00.
customer_reviews.author: filosab

customer_reviews.title: This bike is magical.
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to assemble. I was able to put it together with the instructions, in 15-20 minutes. It is super heavy, so if you have to carry it up stairs, make sure you have help! It is durable and able to handle me, at 125 lbs & my husband at 175 lbs. The seat is adjustable, to a variety of heights. This bike is totally worth it for the price, especially compared to its competitors. The display measures, HR, time, speed, distance, calories & is relatively accurate.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer...
customer_reviews.text: Once i got my shipment i immediately assembled it. Its super easy and all the screws and nuts are in place which made the process even faster. I am 5'0 and the lowest setting for the seat works great for me. Since we can't go out as much as we did before i decided to order this exercise bike. It has kept my kids busy and active for a change which makes me very very happy. Even my 4 year old uses it standing up of course. Overall its great unboxing, assembling, and there is very little noise almost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, but display is way off
customer_reviews.text: I bike a lot outdoors. Due to the pandemic, I wanted a bike I could use at home. This bike is easy to assemble, and is heavy duty and sturdy. The magnetic resistance is awesome and you can really work up a sweat. On a regular bike, 30 minutes is around 5-6 miles. On this exercise, there is no way I've gone 12 miles. I checked and checked, and really believe it's NOT Kilometres. If it was, it would still be off. I enter the time in my workout app, so I'm not too concerned about it, but am disappointed in the accuracy. I still give this bike a 5 because for the price and workout, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Doo Dah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! Awesome stationary bike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike and recieved it within a week. So delivery was fast! Im a 58 year old woman and was in search of an excercise bike that wouldn't take up alot of space but was of good quality. This bike exceeded my expectations. Its very sturdy, well made metal, easy to assemble, instructions are clear and easy to understand. I did my first 20 minute excercise to try it out. I am so happy with it!!! The monitor measures speed, pulse, calories, miles, time. Just awesome! It folds up,has wheels just a nifty piece of machinery. Very pleased with this purchase and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: A small beautiful bike that is a delight to use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a small bike that was sturdy and felt comfortable but still looked good. I was just about to give up finding something that met all her requirements when I came across this piece of equipment. So I bought it and hoped for the best. Wow! This thing looks beautiful and it's very stable....no weird or jerky motions. And it's a light weight bike that she can move to the family room when she wants to exercise in there instead of the exercise room. This bike is the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: It was great until today.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike several months ago. With the quarantine I finally had time to use it. Sadly, one of the pedals snapped. Upon inspection, the tread inside had completely worn. So, it was fine until I used it everyday. I’m really sad because I enjoyed it. I’m giving it 3 stars because (before it broke) the seat was kind of aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BIKE YOU WILL LOVE
customer_reviews.text: OMG this bike is amazing! The seat is very cushioned, the bike is super quite, the computer tells you calories burned, how long you ride and much more. The bike folds up like a ironing board and easy to store and not to mention it has wheels to roll it where you want it, I’m so very happy with this bike and so glad I made the purchase. I recommend this bike to anyone looking to exercise. NO I did not receive any discounts or special promotions I just love reviews giving on products with details
customer_reviews.author: Vicky in TN

customer_reviews.title: For the price.....wow
customer_reviews.text: Super low price and really nice. Not for extra large or tall people tho. Its compact and light weight and is a very good workout. Its no professional gym equipment but its perfect to get some exercise at home and take up very little space. It feels very solid. I dont pay attention to the screen so I dont know or care if that part works. Just pedal until you feels like you got a good workout. One reviewer said its toxic with a cancer warning sticker but its also labeles for CA and CA says everything causes cancer. Theres cancer warnings on sunglasses at stores in CA too. Just dont chew or suck on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jarbells

customer_reviews.title: The Little Stationary Bike That Could
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I’m getting TOO skinny. Seriously. It melts fat.
customer_reviews.author: Cloves

customer_reviews.title: Great value, bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first workout on this and I love it! Great value price-wise. It lets you pedal backwards, which is awesome. I have been on bikes where it thinks you stopped the workout once you start pedaling backwards, but this bike keeps counting distance and time. It’s suuuuuper quiet! And also really compact, which is great for our little apartment. The only thing is that it overestimates how many calories you burn. It said I burned 260 cals, but my Fitbit said I only burned 160. Overall though, it’s a great bike! I will update if I find any problems as I continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Since the whole work from home went into place I was applaud at how little I actually moved around throughout the day. I live in a VERY small apartment and needed something small but effective without spending an arm and a leg.. this is one if the best purchases I've made in a while. I've been using it now for 2 weeks and I love it.. easy to assemble, extremely quiet, and easy to store out of the way.. love it! It did come a few days late but definitely worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Miller

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite exercise purchases
customer_reviews.text: This bike is seriously fabulous for the price. It's tiny and folds up even tinier. I have a serious garage gym, but I wanted something inside for the winter. This easily fits in a tiny corner in my living room. It took about 10 minutes to assemble, and it is rock solid. The resistance adjust with a simple click on the knob. The display has anything you'd need to track. I ride mine every day. One of my favorite exercise purchases, and that's saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I'm NOT a big person. I'm 5'8, I have the seat on the highest setting, and it's too small for me even. Besides that, many of the components, for example the screen, feel much cheaper than similar bikes. Worst of all, the resistance level cannot be adjusted by very much. The top level is still very easy for me, and I am not super strong by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Givan

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight but Sturdy Cardio Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I am so glad I purchased this bike! It took my husband 10 minutes to assemble, it’s sturdy, almost silent when in use and for the cost it’s an excellent product. I spent so much time looking at other pricier options, and was a little skeptical because $130 seemed too good to be true - but I stand corrected. This has been a great addition to my morning routine and I feel like I get a great workout in without the germs or fitness fanatics at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Bike
customer_reviews.text: I was genuinely surprised at how solid this bike is built, particularly considering the sales price. It was easy to assemble. It has a very comfortable seat. Very quiet. It is not even remotely close to a spin bike, but I've done several video spin classes on it and it gets my heart rate up and my body sweating, which is all one can ask it to do. My only caution is, like many other reviewers have pointed out, don't buy it if you're tall. I'm 5'8" and have to wear flat-soled shoes in order to sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ultrarunner

customer_reviews.title: Little screen easily breaks off, so be careful! But works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for someone who wants to ride for 20 to 40 minutes a day, perfect for those who are trying to get back into shape from stage 1. If you ride often or work out regularly the highest resistance setting may not be challenging enough for you. I also love that it folds up. Super compact, fits well in my living room so I can watch tv while I ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Lima

customer_reviews.title: Resistance isnt great
customer_reviews.text: This bike sucks. Doesnt produce enough resistance to get a satisfactory workout. I barely sweat and I keep it at the highest level of resistance. So thats a serious drawback. Also, the positioning of the bike is weird. Its not completely upright. Pedals are away from your body. So I think that also negatively impacts the workout. Im debating on whether i should return it
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Look Elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is engineered well, high quality, and incredibly cheap! The assembly is mapped out in the instruction book and easy, so no need to pay extra for this. I am very short (4'7") and it still works for me. I did have to call the company with one question (two extra gizmos in the box which were throwaways) and customer support was great also!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable feeling but ultra quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have had many of these exercise bikes that said they were quiet, this one really is. I can barely hear it when I am using it and not listening to anything else. I don't think the computer is accurate for speed or distance but I don't care about that anyway, I am riding for time and exercise as long as I get that the rest is unnecessary. Bike folds for easier storage and moving around and has wheels on the back to help with moving. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RustyJD

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This is a little uncomfortable because it's so cramped with leg space but I'm getting used to it Update, you cannot get used to the cramped leg space regardless of where you place the seat, and I am not tall or overweight. Also, it puts dramatic stress on your pelvic area because of it. I wish I could return it. I really tried to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Resistance even at max is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This bike has a small range of motion for pedaling and it doesn't go up high enough for a 5' 10 person. HR monitor is very inaccurate. That's not even the worst of it: its max resistance is a joke. I feel that over time I won't even be able go get my heart over 100bpm. Why did I give it 2 stars? It's not bad if you want to sit and read a book and do exercise over the age of 60
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Virtually noiseless, easy to assemble, sturdy and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Since working from home I wasn't getting as much exercise as I usually get. Was looking for a small, basic exercise bike that stores easily in a small space. This model is perfect for me. Very easy to put together with easy to understand instructions. Very sturdy and folds like an ironing board to store in a corner. So far it doesn't make any noise so I can use it while listening to music or with the TV on. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Li

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a new seat with more padding when you order this.
customer_reviews.text: Saves space, I can fold it up and stand it in the closet when not in use. I tend to use it while watching TV instead of just sitting. Doesn't have a big footprint when in use either. Extremely quite. What you get for the price paid is a pretty good deal. My real problem with it is the seat that comes with it is hard as a rock and quite uncomfortable after about 5 minutes. Just buy a new seat with more padding when you order this. Doesn't add much cost and you will be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: ephemeraljokingnot

customer_reviews.title: Bike for short people only!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike to help with regaining mobility after total knee replacement. Almost everything is perfect; price floor space, function, movability, easy to Assemble....BUT!!! I am 5’7”” ( not that tall) and the seat is way too low. Feels like I’m riding a beach cruiser and not an exercise bike......will be limiting my use dramatically. I will keep because at this point the box is toast and I’m not taking apart. But VERY DISAPPOINTED. this bike should only be sold to people under 5’5” if that.....
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: Smooth exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I ordered it back in June as I live in a small home and needed a way to exercise but couldn't have something that took up a lot of room. I had quite the gut and needed to lose it. Since late June I ride just 30 mins 3 times a week and I cover around 10-11 miles each ride and that's getting a bit of a burn but not too hard.... Amazingly I have slimmed down so much others are noticing. I didn't think I'd stick with it but after 430 miles so far I believe it's become a great habit!
customer_reviews.author: arebeltexan

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: To start, I ended up returning the bike due to its small size. I’m 6’0” and I did not notice the height limit in the item description. I put it together in ten minutes with just the included wrench. I would not have kept it though, since the resistance was not enough to give me a workout, even when on the highest setting. Other workout bikes I have used offer a much wider range of resistance that better tailor a workout difficulty to your needs.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: All in all, I like...
customer_reviews.text: but there are 2 issues I have: 1) the seat is NOT comfortable. The part in the front hurts my lady parts a little so I folded a hand towel in half then in half again & put it toward the back of the seat to make it the same level as the front part. Definitely more comfy that way! 2) I am 5'9" & even with the seat on the lowest setting, my knees still hit the handlebars. It would be cool if the handlebars could also raise, like a seat can. It was otherwise easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: 19Crowned82

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: So quiet. Easy assembly, my 13 year old did it for me. Sturdy and easy to move around. I’m so happy to have this since I cancelled my gym membership.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bike
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bike. I've ridden expensive stationary bikes at gyms for years, and the ride on this inexpensive bike is great. At first I thought the pulse monitor was not working correctly. The numbers were jumping all over the place. So I had my wife, the nurse, put her pulse monitor on my finger and, as it turns out, they both tracked each other perfectly. It must be that more expensive bikes have a little extra software that smooths out the reading for the pulse.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Eades (psychotherapist and pastoral counselor)

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Arrived on time 2. Excellent packaging 3. Excellent instructions 4. Easy installation with all necessary tools provided 5. Sturdy construction; large comfortable seat 6. Beautiful design with minimal footprint and rollers on front base to facilitate moving 7. Very quiet so far but have only used about 10 times Only possible con is that the pedal placement is forward in between that of a regular bike and a recliner
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: This bike is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So quiet! I can hardly hear it. We have it in front of the TV. We live in Pasadena where apartments can be kinda small (for waaay too much money!) and it takes very little space. The controls are basic and we don't need anything more, we like basic. If you're looking for a solid built, no-nonsense exercise bike and don't want to spend hundreds, this is the bike. But if you want to spend 500 or more for a huge boat of a machine to hang your jacket on, be my guest. Glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: MoCee

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to get exercise after a knee injury
customer_reviews.text: It was affordable, easy to assemble, lightweight, easy to use and move around, and it is quiet. I am a 5'5 woman and I had knee surgery last year. I can't bend my right knee past 90 degrees so I needed something tall enough that I could adjust it to accommodate that limitation. On the longest setting I can use it and it feels great to be able to get some cardio exercise again! Very happy with the purchase and I hope my review can help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: SaiyanMother

customer_reviews.title: I personally love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I’ve already gotten two other family members to buy. It’s great especially if you’re looking for moderate cardio. I’m pregnant and this is perfect. The resistance goes up to 8, which no, is not a LOT, but you feel it once you keep your steady pace. I like it, and still feel great. If you’re someone who does fancy spin classes or cross country bike riding, maybe not for you. Lol go get yourself something with more resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lasala

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend Buying
customer_reviews.text: Brought this bike during quarantine and I have to say it was a great buy! It’s easy to assemble, about 20-30 mins, and not heavy. I use it daily in my small apartment and it doesn’t take up much space at all. Which was a huge selling point for me. It tracks your distance, heart rate, time, speed and calories. It has the loops for sneakers, so no specials shoes needed. And the seat is actually comfortable!! If you are looking for a good way to get some exercise in at home while you locked in or even just cause, and you don’t want to spend an arm and a leg this is a great bike to have. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: So happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great investment, especially after Covid 19 shut down my apartment complex's gym. My fiance and I both get a lot of use out of it. There's no sound or anything. The resistance is good. It's very basic, but works great for indoor workouts. This is a good investment if you want to workout while watching TV or reading a book, or even playing video games. I've played various video games while riding it for an hour and a half. It's super easy to move around and is silent. We move it room to room in our apartment with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Raymond Shea Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable value.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. Was skeptical due to price, but for 110 dollars it far exceeds expectations. Cheap, easy to assemble, sturdy, easy to transport and silent while operating. One of the best items I've ever bought considering the price. I can't recommend it enough for value.
customer_reviews.author: Jl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life changing purchase for me. I'm someone who hates going to the gym and it's often a daunting task to get dressed, get in the car, drive all the way there just to work out. This bike has changed the game for me. I just roll it out of the closet (I live in a small one-bedroom apartment in LA and it fits perfectly in a closet when folded up) and bike for 30-40 min while watching TV. It's super a simple, perfect little bike for me!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable exercise bike that would fit in my small living room, and this bike fit the bill. It was very easy to assemble, and folds up small enough to fit in the corner without being obtrusive. The bike seat is more comfortable than I expected, and the bike is also pretty quiet. Overall I think this bike is a great deal for your money. I don't think you could do crazy intense workouts on it, but it's nice to do some LISS cardio while watching Netflix which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Pelanne

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but good enough. Seat uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is an alright budget bike. It's compact enough for small spaces but honestly really bulky for anyone under 5'3". It's also heavier than you think it would be. The seat is uncomfortable due to its upward angle and wideness- you can adjust height but not position/orientation of the seat. I feel like the calorie counter is also really off as it seems to burn calories super quickly. On another note, the pedals on my bike were dirty and covered in some gross dusty brown substance. But admittedly the bike does get the job done and the resistance on it is good, can definitely get a workout from it.
customer_reviews.author: iJone

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price. Not for stand-up riding must sit :-(
customer_reviews.text: CONS: Calories counter very inaccurate. Peddles awkwardly placed below handles, not the seat, so cant ride out of saddle standing up that you need for most spin/cycle videos if you want to stream a peloton or soul cycle-esk class online in your home. The seat height is adjustable up or down but not the distance from seat to handles PRO: It is super quiet & smooth ride while sitting and easy to move around when finished.
customer_reviews.author: kmo

customer_reviews.title: 5'1 no problems
customer_reviews.text: Since all the gyms are closed, I decided to invest in this. My husband and I were skeptical, but this bike is great! I'm 5'1 and my husband is 6'1 and we are both able to ride comfortably. Obviously, it doesn't compare to a higher end model, but it gets the job done. I try to stay seated majority of the time (rather than stand/ride) as I'm not sure how sturdy the pedals are yet. Otherwise, a great addition to a home gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: My bike was delivered today, and within 20 minutes I had assembled it and started a work out. It's not noisy, at all! And it's fairly easy to move (super easy on hard floor, less so on carpet). During the covid-19 pandemic, my bedroom has also turned into my home office and home gym. This compact bike fits my small space well, and definitely got my heart rate up! The one thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars is that the resistance level don't really crank up the resistance until I've run out of tension levels. Still, I don't regret this purchase and would recommend it to anyone considering it.
customer_reviews.author: Jiffy Pop

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to workout from home!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a product for hard core cyclists. However, I love spinning classes and this does the trick for me, still. I bought this because I live in a remote area that doesn't have a reliable gym. Although I do go on hikes a lot, it's still nice to have something I can hop on for a morning workout. I also live in a very small space, so keeping things out of the way is super important in my home and this is great for my situation!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for semi lazy people who just want something ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for semi lazy people who just want something to do while they watch netflix, play video games, etc. Although I do want to note that the seat isn't exactly the greatest. I noticed my butt getting uncomfortable within 10 minutes and I'd say that my butt is pretty beefy. So if you have a boney behind, I'd definitely recommend a seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: shark

customer_reviews.title: Great, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this bike. I have been using it for an hour a day for several weeks now and haven't had a single issue. It's quiet and easy to move around when needed. It's small enough to fit into my condo with ease but I also don't feel like the size takes away from the exercise at all. I am 5'7" and have no issues with the seat height or pedals and find it comfortable enough to be on for an hour. This is a great option for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little stationary bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is way better than I could've expected. The seat is a bit wide for my taste and starts to bother after 45 min of peddling. But the bike itself is very quiet and the resistance is very noticeable between levels. Overall this bike definitely exceeded my expectations. It is very light weight and easy to carry if needed. I would recommend this bike to anyone that doesn't want to spend an arm and a leg for a bike that is a well known name brand that you would just basically be paying for its name and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kite

customer_reviews.title: Xterra Fitness Bike Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Owned several fitness bikes in the past. Many where 3 times as expensive, however this fitness bike is better. The only thing it's lacking is more holes for seat height as it's needed for taller guys like myself. Xterra Fitness has a very quiet ride, good tension and the seat is very comfortable. The bike is light easy to move. Very well built and good quality.. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Great way to exercise.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exercise bike to use during my quarantine from the corona virus so that I can get exercise while being shut in. Can't go to my gym so this is the next best thing. It is extremely easy to put together. No more than a half an hour. It is so very quiet so no one is disturbed no matter what time of day I use it. It is very easy to move around from room to room. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, did it in minutes. Feels sturdy, and the seat is adjustable easily to accommodate my 5'11" and my roommate's 5'4". Seat is not super comfortable, but I wasn't expecting to be sitting on a pillow on this model. The resistance setting is easy to use and has a very wide range from "leisurely Sunday drive" to "oh, my, this is pretty strenuous, isn't it?" For a first time exercise bike, I'd say that this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ryan Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a couple of days ago so not a lot of riding time yet... but assembly was a breeze, even for me. So far the seat is comfortable enough. I started at low resistance and am going up slowly. The bike is sturdy, quiet, fun. I am really, really enjoying it and feel like I will be able to get a lot of aerobic benefit from it. For the money it is a great buy and really, it would be a great buy if it cost more in my opinion. If you are undecided I say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s really difficult to get the straps on the pedals into the other side. I’ve had it for months now and have only been able to get one foot strap to connect with a lot of manipulating and stretching. After two months of minimal use, it’s starting to make a very quiet noise with every rotation but over all, the noise is almost non existent, very quiet. I’m 5’4” and it adjusts for my height and the seat is extra wide so it’s much more comfortable than other seats.
customer_reviews.author: Arica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this little bike!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and doesn't take up much space. Seat is comfortable and bike is very sturdy and doesn't shift when peddling hard. Also very quiet. Perfect for those days I don't make it outside for a run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Okay Bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for physical therapy after my knee surgery and it was perfect for that purpose. It was easy enough to put together, I think my biggest complaint would be that the piece the pedals attach to isn't very long so my heels hit when going around if I'm not actively pushing them outwards. The bike resistance is good for physical therapy but not really for exercise in my opinion - I'm almost maxed out and I'm only 7 weeks out of my surgery. All in all a good bike for if you just want something easy to do, but not if you wanna go hard on the exercise.
customer_reviews.author: SQuigley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Ending!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this bike! But I’m stuck on assembling the left pedal, which will not go in. The screw might be stripped, Help! All I need is a new pedal! Omg! I’ve done it, I assembled the whole bike without the pedal and by some miracle of miracles the pedal (which I wrapped with Teflon tape) went on and I’m a happy camper now! It’s a perfect fit for me cause I’m a shorty, only five feet, which is one of the reasons I chooses this bike. So happy I don’t have to return it. The End.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Best bike ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bike!! The first time I got on, I stayed on for 15 minutes. The only problem I have with this is the seat gets very uncomfortable after using it a while. Otherwise, I could have stayed on much longer. Very easy and smooth. And extremely quiet!! I can really feel the workout. I love that its small and very easy to move from room to room and it folds up easily. This is a fantastic bike at a great price. Get it now and get healthy and fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for less expensive
customer_reviews.text: The stationary bike was easy to assemble. I'm a petite woman and I had no problem putting it together in our garage and then moving it to the bedroom. It is very compact, I don't need to even fold. I used it the day it arrived and it does not make loud noise at all. I can ride and watch TV or listen to music without an issue. I wish it was a little easier to move around on carpet but its not heavy and I can pick it up easily enough to the spot I want it. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cardio option for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great solution for being on lockdown and you can’t get to the gym. Big seat. Sturdy. Easy to fold and put away Wheels for rolling away. Heart monitor and distance measuring Cons: I can’t stand up whatsoever. I’m 5’7. Really hard when doing a workout and you can’t adjust the handlebars. Wheels only works when bike not folded up. Otherwise great interim cardio alternative for being home and not blowing the budget on the Peloton. I actually just download their workouts on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, I did it myself in less than 30 mins. Lightweight and easy to move. It is very quiet. My only problem is the console skips time. I usually spin while watching a favorite show or a pre-recorded spin class. Each are already timed, but my console reads a different time. Today, I watched the time go from 13:29 to 13:40. It skipped an entire 10 seconds. So I'm unsure how correct any of the other data is. Other than that, I like it. I am disappointed about the shady console, but I am able to get a good workout in, regardless. And that's what's most important.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: We're a family of 4 in a 2 bedroom, 600 sq ft apt. With the Covid19 situation, our exercise options were limited. I use it for about 45 mins a day. My 8 year old will ride several times a day, when he's watching TV or bored. We were able to squeeze this into a small corner, and placed it on 4 foam squares (probably an ad or recommendation on Amazon for them, but we paid like $20 for a box with more tiles than we needed). Very quiet, we're on the 3rd floor of an apartment, and neighbors downstairs can't hear us on it (we asked).
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am 81 years old. I find it easy to get on and off. I can put it out of the way in no time. I have only had it for a few days and I can pedal it for a half an hour already. The capability to set the resistance pedaling is nice. Also, I can watch the boob tube or read a book while I am pedaling along. My grandson was in dire need of a some bucks for cigarettes or whatever, so I paid him to assemble it. It took less than an hour. The AA batteries that came with it were wimpy. I had to replace them after a couple hours use
customer_reviews.author: John K. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it! I’ve had it for a month, very sturdy and easy put to put together. I was worried about reaching the pedals because on other bike reviews people had that problem. But I’m 5’0, and didn’t have that problem. Also, the seat is adjustable. I think it is great starter stationary bike.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole king

product_meta.title: XTERRA Fitness FB150 Folding Exercise Bike, Silver
product_meta.description: Looking for an effective way to burn calories and get in better shape, but don’t have much room? The XTERRA Fitness FB150 Folding Bike is the perfect exercise tool to help you comfortably pedal away the calories. With folded dimensions of only 18.1” x 18.1” and built in transport wheels, it allows you to store it away when not in use and free up some valuable floor space. For troubleshooting the noise sounds: (1). Confirm if the unit is completely assembled and all bolts/nuts are tightened. Also, the seat height adjustment should be tightened. (2). Rotate the pedals, moving on to pulling on the pedal and crank arms to check for play/movement. (3). Separate the front covers to get a visual of the inside rotating assembly. (4). Look for anything making contact with the rotating assembly inside or if the parts rotate without a wobble.
feature_bullets: Solid x-frame design folds to just 18. 1" x 18. 1" of floor space when not in use
Large anatomically designed seat and multi-grip padded handlebars are designed for long lasting comfort and support
2" x 1" LCD window is easy to read with all the necessary information - clearly displays speed, distance, time, calories, and pulse
8 levels of manual resistance are easily controlled through the large Dial tension knob for users of all fitness levels
